var findShipPlacement=function findShipPlacement(ship,board){// check if ship is on board
if(board.find(function(cell){return cell.hasShip===ship.name;})){var boardWithIndex=board.map(function(cell,index){cell.index=index;return cell;});var shipLocation=boardWithIndex.filter(function(cell){return cell.hasShip===ship.name;});var axis=shipLocation[shipLocation.length-1].index-shipLocation[0].index<=5?'x':'y';return{start:shipLocation[0].index,axis:axis};}else{return;}};export default findShipPlacement;
